## Introduction
This is the Codebook describing the tidy data from the course project of the Coursera course - Get and Clean Data

## Variable description
1. subject - the subjects participated in carrying out the activities
2. activity.labels - the activities conducted by the subject 
3. 561 features - these are means, each which was computed from measures of the 561 features of the raw data respectively after grouping by each subject and then by each activities. 
   For example, subject 1, do LAYING 6 times and we have values of a measure for those 6 times. Then the mean is computed over those 6 times of LAYING.
